主体段两种写作思路

注意当中贯穿 Topic Vocabulary (主题相关词汇, 同样的词不同的说法)

Firstly, Secondly, Finally

advantages, disadvantages, problems, solutions. 可以采用这种写法

主体结构:

  1. Topic sentence
  2. Firstly [+ Example]
  3. Secondly [+ Example]
  4. Finally [+ Example]

3-minute plan:

Idea, Explain, Example

on idea, a reaspon, an opinion

Idea

Explain (2 or 3 sentences)

Example

3-minute plan:

总结段

repeat, summarise

不要在写新的东西(信息), 只能对先前信息的总结

改写第一段就可以

连接词

连接词并不会提高分数, 所以可以尽量用固定的连接词, 不用花样很多，记几个常用的即可。

Introduction

  • It is true that …
  • While …., I do believe …

Conslusion

  • In conclusion,
  • I would argue that

改写技巧

  • more benefits than -> advantages outweigh disadvantages

Plan

3个步骤, 10 分钟, 步骤 1-2 花 3-4 分钟完成，步骤3 花6，7分钟完成

1.认真读清题目

2.Plan your eassy structure

  1. Introduction: topic + answer
  2. 主要讲什么
  3. 主要讲什么
  4. Conclusion: repeat answer

3.Plan ideas for the two main paragraphs (6 mins)

  • brainstorm, note down any ideas you have
  • develop ideas in detail
  • keep asking yourself ‘why’?
  • think of examples to support your ideas
  • finally, try to group related ideas(number them)

用箭头 -> 把思路链连接起来

Opinion essay

You can use “I” or “my”.

  1. 训练写 Plan
  2. 训练连接词使用
  3. 训练改写
